title: 【課務組】線上教學相關事項說明  Online Teaching Usage Instructions
author: 課務組
content:
分類： 行政公告, 課程公告
來源： 教務處課務組 - 課務組 - utd1003@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6122-6126
對象： 全校教師_兼任教師
標題： 【課務組】線上教學相關事項說明  Online Teaching Usage Instructions 
日期： Sun, 7 Apr 2024 15:54:47 +0800

各位老師好：
      本校因應0403花蓮強震，於4/9(二)停課一天，但因部分校舍、學生宿舍及設備受損尚待修復，因此，全校之課程自4/10-26先調整為線上課程，以為因應。圖資處已提供Teams 簡易使用說明供參，請參圖資處首頁或以下網址：
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BqrfKX42iVrnjEVmtZJ392a0FjAbEQ9o1ntG0_VKf4g/edit
      有關期中評量，建請教師改以線上方式或繳交報告等彈性多元方式辦理。

Dear professors, 
In response to the 0403 Hualien earthquake, the school will be closed for one day on April 9 (Tuesday). However, due to damage to some of the school buildings, student dormitories, and equipment that need to be repaired, all courses at the school were adjusted to online courses from April 10-26. The Office of Library and Information Services has provided Teams with simple usage instructions for reference. Please refer to The Office of Library and Information Services homepage or the following URL:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BqrfKX42iVrnjEVmtZJ392a0FjAbEQ9o1ntG0_VKf4g/edit

Regarding the mid-term evaluation, it is recommended that professors use flexible and diverse methods such as online or report submission.
